text: Goudarz Davoudi (, born 7 April 1993) is an Iranian Football Goalkeeper, who currently plays for Persian Gulf Pro League club Esteghlal Khuzestan and also Iran national under-23 football team. ==Club career== ===Naft masjed Soleyman=== Davoudi started his career with Naft Masjed Soleyman. He was part of Naft Masjed Soleyman in promotion to Iran Pro League in 2014. He made his professional debut for Masjed Soleymani side on the last fixture of 2014–15 Iran Pro League against Malavan. ===Club career statistics=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Division !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Hazfi Cup !colspan="2"|Asia !colspan="2"|Total |- !
